thread.title: Vanessa and Nick Lachey Just Shared a Heartwarming New Photo of Their Newborn
thread.title_full: Vanessa and Nick Lachey Just Shared a Heartwarming New Photo of Their Newborn

author: maressabrown
title: Vanessa and Nick Lachey Just Shared a Heartwarming New Photo of Their Newborn
text:
Vanessa and Nick Lachey Just Shared a Heartwarming New Photo of Their Newborn Vanessa and Nick Lachey Just Shared a Heartwarming New Photo of Their Newborn 
The celebrity couple took to Instagram to celebrate their son Phoenix's "2 months and counting." By Maressa Brown Comments 
Axelle/Bauer-Griffin/Getty Images Vanessa and Nick Lachey may just be one of the cutest, most down-to-earth couples in Hollywood. The celebrity parents recently welcomed their third L.O., a son named Phoenix Robert , back on Christmas Eve. Yesterday, they shared the same photo of their newborn to their individual Instagram accounts, and it is so beautiful. 
In the shot, Phoenix is wearing a blue-striped onesie and lying on a blanket with a pattern that looks like wings. Proud papa Nick's caption : "2 months and counting.... #phoenixrobertlachey." Vanessa's? "My Phoenix" with two blue heart emojis. Aww! Check it out. A post shared by Vanessa Lachey (@vanessalachey) on Feb 24, 2017 at 2:28pm PST RELATED: Vanessa Lachey's Baby Blessings 
What a handsome baby boy. And these posts are just further proof that the Lacheys, who are also parents to son Camden John, 4, and daughter Brooklyn Elisabeth, 2, seem to be very much on the same page. (They're both Scorpios, after all!) 
Here's a fun photo of them with their two eldest from back in the fall. A post shared by Vanessa Lachey (@vanessalachey) on Oct 19, 2016 at 7:53pm PDT 
Adorable, right? And if you can't get enough of baby Phoenix, you're in luck, because Vanessa shared this photo back on V-Day that is seriously so cute, it'll have you in tears. (You've been warned.) Want the latest parenting news? Sign up for our Parents Daily newsletter A post shared by Vanessa Lachey (@vanessalachey) on Feb 14, 2017 at 12:12pm PST 
So happy for this sweet family!
